    About Me

    "If you want to create the life you are dreaming of; you are at the perfect place!".


    Many years ago, I was struggling with eating disorders. I was searching for endless information and different diets to help me regain my happiness and wellbeing.


    I was done with pretending and struggling!


    Done with following the accepted and expected path or hoping and wishing that one day my life would be different. I knew I was meant to thrive and be excited when waking up in the morning because I enjoyed life.


    "I wanted to say „YES!“ to my dreams!"


    The journey of starting a vegan and later a fruit-based lifestyle has transformed my whole life (relationships, money, and the countries I live in). It has allowed me to be my authentic self and step into my power.
    I started to feel good about myself and started to face the fears that had been holding me back for too long.


    "I’m now free to create the life I am meant to be living."


    I see how people’s lives and health transforms after going fruit-based vegan and it is truly astonishing. Clearer skin, weight loss, happiness more maturity and balance, better relationships, more traveling, and feeling more confident in who they are are just some of the effects that a fruit-based vegan lifestyle can create.


    "This is possible for you too! And I’m going to show you how."


      5 Facts About Me

    • 1. What’s my zodiac sign?

    • 5. Most important message?

      Go fruit-based vegan.
